text: Robin Trainor (25 April 1934 – 2020 or 2021) is a Northern Irish retired association footballer. He played for Coleraine F.C., and won 5 Northern Ireland amateur caps (1958–1959), and 2 Irish League caps (1957–1958), and was a non-travelling member of the 1958 World Cup squad. ==Other websites== *Northern Ireland's Footballing Greats Category:Northern Irish footballers Category:1934 births
title: Bobby Trainor
